title: United We Dance: NYE Rave - 21+ ONLY
description: The Fillmore Is A General Admission Standing Room Only Venue Unless Otherwise Noted. 21+ ONLY Doors: 8:00PM Show: 9:00PM Ticket prices will increase the day of the show. All dates, acts, and ticket prices subject to change without notice. All tickets are subject to applicable service fees via all points of purchase.

title: Duke's Mayo Bowl: Wake Forest v Mississippi State
description: WAKE FOREST will be the AWAY team located on the NORTH SIDELINE and the WAKE FOREST BAND will be located in the EAST ENDZONE. MISSISSIPPI STATE will be the HOME team located on the SOUTH SIDELINE and the MISSISSIPPI STATE BAND will be located in the WEST ENDZONE. Bank of America Stadium was designed for fans of all ages. Please note that every child over the age of 12 months is required to have a game ticket to enter the stadium. Any child under the age of 12 months admitted without a ticket must share a seat with an accompanying adult. Full refunds will be available if a game is canceled and cannot be replayed, or if it is played under conditions that prevent fans from attending. Bank of America Stadium adheres to the NFL bag policy for all events. For more information and details on the bag policy, please go to www.nfl.com/allclear.

title: enRAGE Against The Machine

title: Cam Bertrand
description: Garage parking is available on 6th street make a right as you pass the venue into the garage and take the elevator down to the 1st floor. Our kitchen opens 1 hour before showtime so you can come in and order food from the QR Code on your table and you will receive a text message alerting you that your order is ready.

title: Sherri Shepherd
description: VIP-MEET & GREET tickets are the first row of seats in front of the stage and it includes a picture with Sherri Shepherd after the show. Land & Sea Restaurant is located inside of Headliners for all food services 1 hour prior to the show and throughout the night. Please do not purchase tickets from secondary markets we will only honor tickets purchased through Ticketmaster for this show.
